remarks:
Subset theorem for Cartesian product.  Generalization of Theorem 101 of [Suppes] p. 52.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)

 Subset theorem for cross product.  Generalization of Theorem 101 of [Suppes] p. 52.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
statement: xpss12 $p |- ( ( A C_ B /\ C C_ D ) -> ( A X. C ) C_ ( B X. D ) ) $.
